text: @Mdude360 MM9 and MM10's covers were intentionally bad, as a reference to MM1 and MM2's covers which were un-intentionally bad.
author: drunyon214

text: @drunyon214 Oh, that's sweet of them. Weird, but sweet. Kind of like making a homage to your missing appendix.

text: @Mdude360 We hold you in our hearts because we can no longer hold you in our guts.
